name: Network Velocity
description:
San Diego based Network Velocity provides Professional IT Support and Google Apps Migration services to clients across the United States. Our US based Google Apps Certified Deployment Specialists help businesses transform their relationship with Messaging and Collaboration with migration, training and business consulting for businesses of all sizes.
Our clients experience reduced costs and higher productivity as a result of migrating to Cloud based Messaging and Collaboration tools provided by Network Velocity.
